meanings.definition: The act of walking or performing acrobatic feats on a tightrope.
meanings.sent1: The ropedancings at the circus amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: She practiced her ropedancings every day to improve her balance.
meanings.sent3: The cat attempted ropedancings on the clothesline, much to the family's surprise.
meanings.sent4: His confidence was like a skilled ropedancings artist, never faltering under pressure.
meanings.sent5: The image of her graceful ropedancings lingered in his mind long after the show.

meanings.definition: A performance or display of skill on a tightrope.
meanings.sent1: The ropedancings show drew a large crowd to the park.
meanings.sent2: The ropedancings competition showcased incredible talent and precision.
meanings.sent3: The ropedancings event was so entertaining that even the birds stopped to watch.
meanings.sent4: Her ropedancings on the tightrope were like a mesmerizing ballet in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The ropedancings performance left everyone in awe of the performers' abilities.

meanings.definition: The skill or practice of walking or performing on a tightrope.
meanings.sent1: Learning ropedancings requires focus and determination.
meanings.sent2: He admired the dedication it took to master the art of ropedancings.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's ropedancings across the power lines amused the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: Her ropedancings skills were as impressive as they were graceful.
meanings.sent5: The ropedancings training was both challenging and rewarding for the students.
